Articles.Content: How do i actvate time warp on xbox

Try pressing Y to bring up a control wheel, hold right on the left stick to select the fast forward icon, and press A to choose it. That activates the time warp controls. Pressing RT will increase time warp and LT will decrease time warp.

Alternatively you can press in the left stick to bring up the cursor, then click on the time warp interface in the upper left as you would on PC.

That is with the Radial control scheme. There may be some differences with the other control schemes.
